title: Modern Style - please help to ID
content:
Please help ID this font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121140541im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/modstrange_5945.jpg)

 [‹ need help with this Impact-looking typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121140541/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50370 "Go to previous forum topic") [Clean Sans Serif Corporate Type? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121140541/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50397 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mkstudio

comments.content: How old is this. Where did you find this? I looks as if someone removed all of the curve points in a Bodoni of some kind.

I don’t think it’s either of these, but it is similar to [Vendome](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121140541/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/vendome/), and [Freight Big](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121140541/http:/www.dardenstudio.com/typefaces/freight_big).

HI, a student of mine at Parsons took a photograph of it on a sign in her neighborhood. I don’t know anything more.  
I see Vendome in this.  
But especially see characteristics of Ed Benguiat’s Modern #20 combined with some version of Latin.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121140541im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/incomemod_5137.jpg)
